report.title: Snorted Overdose
report.author: J
report.bodytext: /n /n /n Recently I acquired 40mg of 2C-E in one bag from a friend. This is the first time that I had ever taken a phenylthylamine. I decided to take half the bag. I busted it out and separated it into two lines. So it was 20 and 20. Taking 20mg of 2c-e orally is a hard enough trip in itself. Not knowing how crazy it was instead of taking the 20mg orally I snorted it. /n /n All I have to say is that this was the fastest that any drug has ever kicked in. Approximately 3 minutes after snorting it a very strong feeling started to come over me. The walls began to flash and I began to fry very very hard. An extremely strong sense of terrifying fear and paranoia began to come over me. Basically I began to wig out. I began to become very sick to my stomach and started vomiting. Even thought I was freaking out extremely hard, the visuals that ensued were fucking ridiculous. /n /n As I was staring at the ground the grass looked liked octagon shaped stained glass in sections swirling in and out of each other. After the I stopped throwing up and freaking out approximately an hour after I had snorted it I went to sit down inside. I was still frying very and couldnt stop shaking. /n /n About 4 hours into it I began to feel sane again and started to calm down. The drug finally wore off totally about 8 hours after taking it. This was my first time taking a phenylthylamine and I obviously made a huge mistake snorting 2C-E.
